/* GameRecordManagerRepository.findGameJoinTeamRecordsByGameSeq */ SELECT GAME_JOIN_TEAM_SEQ , GAME_SEQ , TEAM_SEQ , TEAM_NAME , HOME_AWAY_CODE FROM GAME WHERE 1=1 AND GAME_SEQ = #{gameSeq}
